body_html:
The repo you referenced has a bug. It sets model to eval when generating samples and logging, but never sets it back to train after returning to training.

You didn't see this error in 0.3.1 because we introduced this check after 0.3.1.
body_text:
The repo you referenced has a bug. It sets model to eval when generating samples and logging, but never sets it back to train after returning to training.
You didn't see this error in 0.3.1 because we introduced this check after 0.3.1.
body:
The repo you referenced has a bug. It sets model to `eval` when generating samples and logging, but never sets it back to train after returning to training.

You didn't see this error in 0.3.1 because we introduced this check after 0.3.1.
